title: I lag REALLY hard from the 0:00 - 1:00 minute mark.
body:
To start off, my ping always sits at 66-68, never varies under usual circumstances. My computer runs everything Ultra HD so Its not a lack in hardware, and I've reinstalled the client twice. 

Every game I lag really bad from 0;00-1:00 this mostly consists of my character skipping backwards and forwards a few steps. I've noticed this happen on Tobias Fates stream occassionally as well. This happens on all maps, though much more common on Summoners Rift (every game) vs ARAM (occassionally).

As my name suggests I am a jungle main, so the usual time I see this glitch is when I spawn, buy items, and click on my red or blue buff location. My character starts to autopath, though every few steps gets set back one or two steps. On top of this my ping NEVER changes through this glitch. 

Porocles I summon thee by name.

Porocles, Porocles, Porocles!

replies.body: Yessir, thanks for the help as always
